 2017-06002017-06-02,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PSPC,  OAG,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of the Auditor General of Canada
PrecisOrder Appointing (1) KPMG LLP, Chartered Accountants, of Toronto, Ontario, as AUDITOR of the Canada Post Corporation for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR of the Canada Post Corporation for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017.
AttachmentsAttachment
